[[Mr. Waltham]] (brother-in-law)
[[Emily Waltham's cousin|Unnamed nephew-by-marriage]] | relationships = [[Stephen Waltham]] (husband) | seasons = S1 S2 S3 [[Season 4|S4]] [[Season 5|S5]] S6 S7 S8 S9 S10 }} '''Andrea Waltham''' is [[Emily|Emily's]] stepmother. She was portrayed by [[Jennifer Saunders]]. Andrea is a very shrewish woman and has a bad marriage with [[Stephen Waltham|her husband]]. They are both hostile towards [[Jack Geller|Jack]] and [[Judy Geller]] when they refuse to pay for the Walthams' wine cellar and to have their house remodeled. In "[[The One After Ross Says Rachel]]" Andrea tells [[Ross Geller|Ross]] that she thinks he is "delicious".
